dialogue: Dilbert, this is Ellen, your new project manager.
If you do a bad job, Ellen will be on you like a ton of bricks.
And if you do a good job, she will feel threatened by your success and make it her mission to destroy you.
Did you just tell me I'm going to lose no matter what I do?
If you can't take the heat, stay out of the kitchen.
And by kitchen I mean the entire job market.
I have a bad feeling about this.
